Congrats to Arvada's Apex Tennis Center for being recognized by the U.S. Tennis Association (USTA) with an award for excellence. They are 1 in 25 tennis facilities to win this award and the only facility in Colorado to receive this award in 2019. #GoodNewsReport #TisAPrivilege

This week the House overwhelmingly passed legislation to reform our federal cannabis laws & reduce the public safety risk in communities. It's the 1st time Congress passed a bill reforming federal marijuana laws since the CSA passed in 1970. #SAFEBanking http://bit.ly/2ln2vkC

The #SAFEBankingAct passed by a vote of 321 to 103 in the U.S. House! This is a huge milestone in reforming federal cannabis laws and reducing the public safety risk in communities across the country. #SAFEBanking #copolitics
I appreciate your support and look forward to the #SAFEBankingAct passing the House. https://twitter.com/CUNA/status/1176967088021393414 …

Thank you to @RepDennyHeck for his partnership through the years on the #SAFEBankingAct. I also want to thank @RepMaxineWaters for making this bill a priority, 
@RepSteveStivers & @WarrenDavidson for their support as well as @RepGregoryMeeks & @RepKatiePorter for their help.
The #SAFEBankingAct has broad industry and bipartisan support ranging from financial services and law enforcement to insurance and real estate. pic.twitter.com/whJU4RJ7R2

.@RepDennyHeck: "If you want your businesses to be safer, vote yes." 

"If you want your communities to be safer, vote yes."

Vote yes on the #SAFEBankingAct

Conflict between state & federal law means legal, legitimate businesses are forced to operate on a cash-only basis creating a serious public safety risk & providing an opportunity for tax evasion, money laundering and other white-collar crimes. Time to pass the #SAFEBankingAct. pic.twitter.com/3pFcPdvbzg
#SAFEBanking is about public safety, accountability and respecting states’ rights. Join me in passing the #SAFEBankingAct today. pic.twitter.com/DCgvjdCd6z

The #SAFEBankingAct further clarifies the protections from the 2018 Farm Bill to allow hemp businesses to gain better access to financial services. https://twitter.com/chlobo_ilo/status/1176957899228295168 …

Americans across the country are voting to approve some level of marijuana use & we need these marijuana businesses & employees to have access to checking accounts, lines of credit & more. #SAFEBanking will improve transparency & reduce the public safety risk in our communities.

Today 97.7% of Americans live in a state where some form of marijuana is legal. Looking forward to the vote on the #SAFEBankingAct to get cash off our streets and into the banking system. pic.twitter.com/bIT5p1eJg2

#SAFEBanking is a big deal for the thousands of employees, biz & communities who have been forced to deal in piles of cash.
